testcase.classname: This feature is to test the MyTheresa Men's collection page
testcase.name: Validate all the links available on webpage and logging into the account
testcase.system-out: Given Launch mytheresa page and validate page loaded successfully...........passed Then User validates Men is selected under gender categories.................passed And User gets all the links available in the web page and validates response codes.passed When User clicks on my account button.......................................passed And User enters reshmaegalapati@maildrop.cc and zipsRules1 to login.........passed Then User validates the Reshma Test and reshmaegalapati@maildrop.cc login information.passed
